title: Giant Fly Glue Trap by Catchmaster - 3 Packs 30 Feet Each Pre-Baited, Ready to Use Indoors & Outdoors. Bug Insect Infestation Sticky Adhesive Scented Green Color Barn Paper Sheet Disposable Non-Toxic
descriptions:
Stop swatting and start winning against flies with the Giant Fly Glue Trap by Catchmaster. Each pack delivers 30 feet of pre-baited, ready-to-use protection—scented to attract pests and engineered to hold them fast. With 3 rolls included, you get a massive 90 feet of coverage to tackle even heavy infestations in homes, barns, waste rooms, animal facilities, and commercial or industrial spaces.

Why you’ll love it:
- Serious surface area: 10 inches wide and up to 3600 square inches of trapping power per roll.
- Long-lasting performance: Field-tested adhesive holds strong for up to one full year under normal conditions.
- Ready in seconds: Just unroll, hang, or mount—no mixing, no mess.
- Works where you need it: Effective indoors and outdoors, including damp and humid areas where other solutions fail.
- Smarter pest control: Pre-baited scented formula draws flies in; green color helps conceal captured insects for a cleaner look.
- Safe and simple: Non-toxic, disposable design fits Intelligent Pest Management strategies without harsh chemicals.

Perfect for residential, commercial, industrial, and agricultural environments—especially high-infestation zones. Avoid use where rodenticides or snap traps are present if those are undesirable, and choose a cleaner, more controlled solution instead. Roll out Catchmaster’s Giant Fly Glue Trap and reclaim your space from buzzing pests—with power that lasts and convenience you can count on.
